Package aeneas.controllers

The controllers package contains the classes which define the behavior of the program, and connects events in the gui to the state of the model.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChildDraggedListener
    listener for dragging
    IMove
    Interface representing a single move action to be completed
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddNumMove
    Move action to add a number to a releae board For use in the builder
    AddPieceMove
    Move action to add a piece to a level For use in the builder
    BoardSizeController
    Move action to change the size of the board Controller for handling changing the size of the board
    BoardToBullpenMove
    Move action to move a piece from the board to the bullpen
    BullpenToBoardMove
    Move action to move a piece from the bullpen to the board
    ChangeLevelTypeMove
    Move action to change the type of a level
    DeleteBoardPieceMove
    Move action to move a piece from the bullpen to the board
    DeleteBullpenPieceMove
    Move action to move a piece from the bullpen to the board
    DeleteHintMove
    Move action to delete an existing hint
    DeleteReleaseNumberMove
    Move action to move a piece from the bullpen to the board
    FlipMove
    Move action to flip a piece
    MakeHintMove
    Move action to create a new hint
    ManipulatePieceController
    single click rotates CW, Shift-click rotates CCW ctrl-click flips across vertical axis, shift-ctrl-click flips across horizontal axis
    MoveNumMove
    Move action to add a number to a releae board For use in the builder
    OnBoardMove
    Move action to move a piece from one location to another on the board
    RotateMove
    Move action to rotate a piece
    SetMovesMove
    Move action to set the allotted moves for a puzzle level For use in the builder.
    SetSizeMove
    Set the number of rows/columns for the board.
    SetTimeMove
    Move action to set the allotted time for a lightning level For use in the builder.
    ToggleTileMove
    Move action to toggle the state of a tile on the board For use in the Builder
    UndoRedoController
    Controller for handling all undoing and redoing

Package aeneas.controllers Description

The controllers package contains the classes which define the behavior of the program, and connects events in the gui to the state of the model. It includes things like drawing the moves that can be done/undone spinners, checkboxes, ect... It also contains the high-level MainView, which controls the toolbar on the top of every window.
